entry.title: WebSharper Extensions for ExtJS 4
entry.summary: In this post I introduce our latest WebSharper Extensions for ExtJS 4.

entry.title: An asynchronous Slot machine
entry.summary: In this post I highlight the enhanced support for asynchronous programming in WebSharper. I show an example, modelling a slot machine as asynchronous computations run in parallel.

entry.title: Interfacing with dynamic JavaScript APIs in WebSharper
entry.summary: This article gives and example of how to interface with dynamically typed JavaScript APIs.

entry.title: Building a Loading Icon Formlet Combinator
entry.summary: In this post I show how to implement a formlet combinator encapsulating the common AJAX pattern of displaying a loading icon while submitting values to the server and waiting for a response.

entry.title: Creating Custom Formlet Controls
entry.summary: This post shows how to create custom formlet controls.

entry.title: Introducing formlets for jQueryUI
entry.summary: In this post I introduce our latest WebSharper extension - Formlets for jQueryUI.

entry.title: Creating a user sign-up form using WebSharper Formlets
entry.summary: In this post I'll highlight some of the features of WebSharper formlets by implementing a user sign-up form.

entry.title: Generalizing formlets
entry.summary: This post highlights some of the new features of our redesigned formlet library.

entry.title: Fun with dependent formlets
entry.summary: In this post I'm implementing a simple spread-sheet grid widget with dynamic summation of rows and columns, using dependent formlets.

entry.title: More of Ext JS and WebSharper
entry.summary: Following up on the previous post on the upcoming WebSharper Ext JS (Native) extension with an example of how to construct a sortable tree widget and reacting to changes of the ordering of tree nodes.

entry.title: Reactive programming with WebSharper
entry.summary: A small example highlighting F# (and WebSharper) support for asynchronous and reactive programming.

entry.title: Writing Ext JS applications with WebSharper
entry.summary: Some examples of how to use the upcoming WebSharper binding for Ext JS.

entry.title: Creating web forms using WebSharper Formlets
entry.summary: In this post I give a short introduction to the WebSharper formlet library.

entry.title: Basic HTML construction with WebSharper
entry.summary: The fundamentals of building HTML (DOM nodes) with WebSharper.
